response.overview: Indie label Drive-Thru Records showcases its impressive stable of post-punk bands with this three-hour-plus compilation of music videos, live performances, behind-the-scenes footage and tour montages. The impressive collection features some of the label's most popular artists, including Hellogoodbye, The Early November, Halifax, Hidden in Plain View, Dave Melillo, I Am the Avalanche, I Can Make a Mess Like Nobody's Business and An Angle.
response.title: Drive-Thru Records: Vol. 4
